item.title: Learning C# - My journey from low-code to mo-code
item.author: mail@michael365.de (Michael Pucknat)
item.description: So it begins I started (or tried to) start learning C# two weeks ago with some youtube videos, but somehow did not get into the right mood to start out seriously. Then I stumbled over this Tweet by Scott Hanselmann : I really like freecodecamp.org and tried it last year to learn some javascript. In combination with content from Microsoft Learn this seems like a great way to finally start digging into C#.

item.title: Hello World
item.author: mail@michael365.de (Michael Pucknat)
item.description: Hi. This is my blog I decided to start writing about my learnings and share my notes and experience with you. Why ? Because I learned so much from other peopleÂ´s blogs and videos and I hope that I can give something back this way. You can read the longer story here

item.title: About me
item.author: mail@michael365.de (Michael Pucknat)
item.description: My name is Michael Pucknat. I live with my wife, two kids and my beagle in the Rhine-Main area in Germany and in my current job role I work as a consultant for all things regarding Microsoft 365 in enterprise environments. When I’m not working, I like to spend time with my family, cooking, playing video games and learn new things. Why I am writing this I’ve been working in IT for over 20 years now.
